name: Xelda 1: Quest for the Golden Apple
overview: This game is not intended to be a clone of Zelda, nor follows the storyline of Zelda. The sprites and title song are derivatives of the original work by Nintendo. However, if the sprites changed and the title song changed, this game in no way would actually resemble Zelda. Therefor this game should not interfere with the rights of Nintendo and their copyright on the game. This game is a top down adventure that has been presented in many other games. This game is not meant for sale. It’s presentedas a programming exercise for entertainment only.
